text: jesus christ said that we would receive
power when the holy spirit comes upon us
you want to be strong in life get some
holy spirit power you want to live by
faith and see miracles happen or get
free from anxiety or depression get
filled with the spirit if you do the
love of god will get stronger in you joy
will come spiritual gifts will start to
take place and you'll even speak with
tongues don't let anyone talk you out of
it so first call on jesus to be saved
and then be filled with the holy spirit
come take your next steps with god at
